snippet.title: Bringing back Dino Crisis - GOG story
snippet.description:
It’s time to finally reveal what we've been cooking!

Get the game 👉 https://bit.ly/dcbundle

Together with CAPCOM, we’ve brought back Dino Crisis and Dino Crisis 2, making them better than ever and fully playable on modern PCs!

The return of these pinnacles of the survival horror genre was demanded loud and clear by gamers around the world. Bringing them back is one of the most exciting things we’ve done.

We could go on and on about why these titles are so important and sublime, but you know this better than anyone. Now, the only thing left to do is let you grab them and relive some of the best gaming experiences ever.

You can find both games packed in a bundle on GOG.COM!

Special thanks to our technical partner Warsaw Museum of Computer and Games for helping with setting up our office retro equipment! 

Subscribe for more content!
#dinocrisis  #retrogaming  #gamingvideos  #gaming  #capcom
